thread.title: Wine Just Off The Vine On The Mason-Dixon Wine Trail Adds New Scavenger Hunt For 2015

author: cbs8
title: Wine Just Off The Vine On The Mason-Dixon Wine Trail Adds New Scavenger Hunt For 2015
text:
York County Convention & Visitors Bureau
YORK, Pa. , Sept. 24, 2015 /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- The 17 family-owned wineries and one distillery of the Mason-Dixon Wine Trail invite you to experience new and favorite locations and enjoy the event's new scavenger hunt during Wine Just Off The Vine November 14-15 and 21-22.
This fall festival for wine lovers is one of two signature events - along with March's Tour de Tanks - extending the tourist season in the Mid-Atlantic's Premier Year-Round Wine Destination. Wine Just Off The Vine provides wine lovers a special opportunity to sample and hear results of this fall's harvests firsthand from wineries across Central Pennsylvania and Northern Maryland .
Adding to the fun this year is a multi-state scavenger hunt in which ticket holders will carry a sheet filled with images of wine and spirit labels and hunt around each location until they find a corresponding label on display. Those who match ALL of the labels with the correct Wine Trail locations will be eligible for a prize.
Tickets for Wine Just Off The Vine this year are $20 and can be purchased at participating locations or online at www.MasonDixonWineTrail.com . Each ticket includes:
The NEW scavenger hunt experience Exclusive tastings at all participating locations during both weekends Light food items Souvenir tasting glass 10% discount on beverage purchases Visit www.MasonDixonWineTrail.com in the coming weeks to explore more about this year's participating locations, a list of convenient getaway packages and perfectly paired winemaker dinners.
Nestled in bucolic Central Pennsylvania and just north of Baltimore, Maryland , York County is your weekend escape to fertile farmlands, rolling hills and picturesque river shorelines paired perfectly with a bustling central downtown where you'll find all the amenities of a big city but with a small-town ambiance.
A stay in York County puts you right the heart of a renowned tourist region amid neighboring destinations such as Gettysburg , Lancaster County and Hershey . For more information on York County , call 1-888-858-9675 or visit www.yorkpa.org .
